text: Ami amara rasulaganake suspasta nidarsanasaha prerana karechi ebam tamdera sathe abatirna karechi kitaba o n'yayaniti, yate manusa inasapha pratistha kare. Ara ami nayila karechi lauha, yate ache pracanda ranasakti ebam manusera bahubidha upakara. Eta ejan'ye ye, allaha jene nibena ke na dekhe tamke o tamra rasulaganake sahayya kare. Allaha saktidhara, parakramasali.
